Dm_ZO_0018_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:Determination_00>Right! The time has finally arrived.
<sp:5:0:0>Off we go!
Dm_ZO_0018_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Determination_00>Understood! I shall be waiting patiently
for you right here!
Dm_ZO_0018_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>I bet a barrel of fish that if we climb this
waterfall, we shall find the source of the
sludge.<sp:5:0:0> Are you ready, Link?
Dm_ZO_0018_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>From what I can tell, all of the sludge
waterfalls are flowing from the ruins
above here.
In other words, if there is a source for this
sludge somewhere, it must be...

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Once you are amply prepared,
let us dive right in!
